statements: SELECT * FROM audit_logs;
SELECT username, action FROM audit_logs WHERE log_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT action, timestamp FROM audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT username FROM audit_logs;
SELECT log_id, username, action, timestamp, details FROM audit_logs WHERE timestamp < NOW() ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE username IN ('John', 'Alice') AND action LIKE '%login%' ORDER BY username ASC, timestamp DESC
SELECT username, COUNT(*) AS total_actions FROM audit_logs GROUP BY username HAVING total_actions > 5 ORDER BY total_actions DESC
SELECT action, COUNT(*) AS total_actions FROM audit_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY action ORDER BY total_actions DESC
SELECT * FROM audit_logs ORDER BY log_id ASC, timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT log_id, action, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 456 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, details FROM audit_logs WHERE action = 'login' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE details LIKE '%error%' ORDER BY log_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, compliance_type FROM compliance_records WHERE date_added > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY compliance_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, action FROM audit_logs WHERE action LIKE 'Login%' ORDER BY log_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, action FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id IN (456, 789) AND action = 'Update' ORDER BY action;
SELECT log_id, user_id, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 789 AND action = 'Delete' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, action, DATE_FORMAT(timestamp, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS formatted_timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 456 ORDER BY log_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM audit_logs;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, log_text FROM audit_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT record_id, record_type, LENGTH(record_data) AS data_length FROM records WHERE record_type = 'document';
SELECT * FROM audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT log_id, log_text, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM records WHERE record_type='financial' ORDER BY record_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role='admin';
SELECT log_text, timestamp FROM audit_logs JOIN records ON audit_logs.log_id = records.record_id WHERE record_type='financial';
SELECT * FROM audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, full_name, department FROM user_records WHERE role='Admin';
SELECT description, category FROM compliance_records WHERE description LIKE '%security%';
SELECT user_id, permission FROM access_controls WHERE role='Manager';
SELECT log_id, user_id, action, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT log_id, user_id, action, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE log_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, full_name, department, role FROM user_records WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT record_id, description, category, timestamp FROM compliance_records WHERE category = 'Security' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, role, permission FROM access_controls WHERE role = 'Admin' AND permission = 'Read';
SELECT log_id, user_id, action, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM user_records WHERE department = 'HR');
SELECT * FROM user_records;
SELECT user_id, record_text FROM user_records ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT trail_info, timestamp FROM audit_trail WHERE log_id = 101;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM compliance_officers WHERE department = 'Finance';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(report_id) AS report_count FROM compliance_reports GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE action = 'login' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM compliance_officers WHERE department = 'Legal' ORDER BY last_name, first_name;
SELECT record_text FROM user_records WHERE is_approved = true AND LENGTH(record_text) > 100;
SELECT user_id, report_text FROM compliance_reports WHERE creation_date > '2022-06-01' ORDER BY user_id ASC, report_id DESC;
